description: The camelback sofa is a common furniture item with a wood frame and a cushion composed of polyurethane foam wrapped in polyester batting and covered with polyester fabric. The design also included cotton batting between the seat back cushion and the fabric as well as structural cardboard wrapped in polyurethane foam in the sofa arms.
short desc: The camelback sofa is a common furniture item with a wood frame and a cushion composed of polyurethane foam wrapped in polyester batting and covered with polyester fabric. The design also included cotton batting between the seat back cushion and the fabric as well as structural cardboard wrapped in polyurethane foam in the sofa arms.
source: Sofas were purchased from a national furniture manufacturer and distributor.
